metadata.title: Administrative Boundaries - Bengaluru Metropolitan Area
metadata.description: Jurisdictional boundaries of planning and development authorities in Bengaluru

sources.title: BBMP Ward Boundaries 2022 (Historical)
sources.note: 243 wards - replaced by GBA 369 wards in 2025

metadata.note: GBA boundaries based on official 2025 delimitation with 5 corporations and 369 wards. BDA jurisdiction reduced from 1,294 km² to 582 km² in 2025 following GBA formation.

authorities.name: Greater Bengaluru Authority (GBA)
authorities.description: Greater Bengaluru comprising 5 municipal corporations. Replaced BBMP governance structure in May 2025.
authorities.boundary_note: GeoJSON with 5 corporation polygons. KML with 369 ward boundaries (December 2025)

authorities.name: Bangalore Development Authority (BDA)
authorities.description: Planning authority covering peripheral areas of Bengaluru Metropolitan Area. Jurisdiction reduced from 1,294 km² to 582 km² in 2025 after GBA formation.

bounds.note: BDA jurisdiction covers peripheral areas beyond BBMP/GBA core. Approximate extended bounds shown.

authorities.boundary_note: Actual BDA jurisdiction boundary data not publicly available in digital format. Covers villages in Anekal, Bangalore North, Bangalore South, Bangalore East taluks outside BBMP limits.

authorities.name: Bangalore Metropolitan Region Development Authority (BMRDA)
authorities.description: Metropolitan region planning authority covering Bengaluru and surrounding districts.

coverage.taluks: Parts of Bangalore Urban, Bangalore Rural, Ramanagara, and Kolar districts

bounds.note: Covers entire Bengaluru Metropolitan Region extending well beyond city limits

jurisdiction_hierarchy.note: Combined jurisdiction (582 km² BDA + 712 km² GBA)

key_changes_2025.impact: BBMP reformed as Greater Bengaluru Authority with 5 municipal corporations
BDA jurisdiction reduced from 1,294 km² to 582 km²
GBA wards finalized at 369 across 5 corporations
key_changes_2025.note: Final delimitation: 369 wards (increased from 243 BBMP wards and intermediate 225 proposed wards)

data_quality_notes.gba_boundary: High accuracy - official GeoJSON with 5 corporation polygons and KML with 369 ward boundaries (December 2025)
data_quality_notes.bda_boundary: Approximate - exact digital boundary not publicly available. Covers peripheral villages in multiple taluks outside GBA core
data_quality_notes.bmrda_boundary: Regional extent - covers 8,005 km² across multiple districts
data_quality_notes.historical_note: BBMP 243 wards (2022) replaced by GBA 369 wards (2025)
